languages.text: Тело Инцендии растерзано, череп пробит, а в обнаженный мозг воткнуты ложки. По всему телу приколочены листки с приговорами.

traits.locale_text: Тело Инцендии нанизано на штык. Ее одежда растерзана, череп пробит, а в обнаженный мозг понатыканы ложки. По всему ее телу приколочены листки с различными приговорами. Среди них выделяется табличка, висящая на ее вывалившихся потрохах: "ЧУДОВИЩЕ".

languages.text: Incendia's body has been savaged. There is a hole in her skull and spoons stuck in her exposed brain. Pieces of paper with verdicts have been nailed all over her body.
languages.original_text: Тело Инцендии растерзано, череп пробит, а в обнаженный мозг воткнуты ложки. По всему телу приколочены листки с приговорами.

traits.locale_text: Incendia's body has been savaged. There's a hole in her skull. Spoons are stuck in her exposed brain. Pieces of paper with verdicts are nailed to her body all over.
Incendia's body has been savaged. There's a hole in her skull. Spoons are stuck in her exposed brain. Pieces of paper with verdicts are nailed to her body all over.
Incendia's body has been savaged. There's a hole in her skull, and poons stuck in her exposed brain. Pieces of paper with verdicts are nailed to her body all over.

Incendia's body has been savaged. There is a hole in her skull and spoons stuck in her exposed brain. Pieces of paper with verdicts have been nailed all over her body.
Incendia's body has been savaged. There is a hole in her skull and spoons stuck in her exposed brain. Pieces of paper with verdicts have been nailed all over her body.

languages.text: 因森蒂娅的尸体已经遭到损毁。她的头骨被砸了个大洞，露在外面的大脑插着一把勺子，浑身上下都被钉满了签了名的判决书。
languages.original_text: Incendia's body has been savaged. There is a hole in her skull and spoons stuck in her exposed brain. Pieces of paper with verdicts have been nailed all over her body.

traits.locale_text: 因森蒂娅的尸体已经遭到损毁。她的头骨上有个大洞，露在外面的大脑上插着一把勺子，身上各个部位都钉满了签了名的判决书。

languages.text: インセンディアの遺体は、飽食されていた。頭蓋骨には穴が開いていて、露出した脳にはスプーンが突き刺さっていた。判決文が書かれた紙が、体中に釘で打ち付けられている。
languages.original_text: Incendia's body has been savaged. There is a hole in her skull and spoons stuck in her exposed brain. Pieces of paper with verdicts have been nailed all over her body.

traits.locale_text: インセンディアの遺体は、飽食されていた。頭蓋骨には穴が開いていて、露出した脳にはスプーンが突き刺さっていた。判決文が書かれた紙が、体中に釘で打ち付けられている。

languages.text: El cuerpo de Incendia ha sido destrozado. Tiene un agujero en el cráneo y cucharas clavadas en el cerebro. Hay trozos de papel con veredictos clavados por todo su cuerpo.
languages.original_text: Incendia's body has been savaged. There is a hole in her skull and spoons stuck in her exposed brain. Pieces of paper with verdicts have been nailed all over her body.

traits.locale_text: El cuerpo de Incendia ha sido destrozado. Tiene un agujero en el cráneo y cucharas clavadas en el cerebro. Hay trozos de papel con veredictos por todo su cuerpo.

languages.text: Incendias Leiche wurde misshandelt. In ihrem Schädel klafft ein Loch und Löffel stecken in ihrem freigelegten Gehirn. Zettel mit Urteilen wurden an ihren gesamten Körper genagelt.
languages.original_text: Incendia's body has been savaged. There is a hole in her skull and spoons stuck in her exposed brain. Pieces of paper with verdicts have been nailed all over her body.

traits.locale_text: Incendias Leiche wurde misshandelt. In ihrem Schädel klafft ein Loch, Harpunen stecken in ihrem freigelegten Gehirn. Zettel mit Urteilen wurden an ihren gesamten Körper genagelt.

languages.text: Le corps d'Incendia a été violemment mutilé, au point que vous pouvez même entrevoir son cerveau et les cuillers qui y sont enfoncées. Des morceaux de papier portant des verdicts ont été purement et simplement cloués dans sa chair.
languages.original_text: Incendia's body has been savaged. There is a hole in her skull and spoons stuck in her exposed brain. Pieces of paper with verdicts have been nailed all over her body.

traits.locale_text: Le corps d'Incendia a été violemment mutilé, au point que vous pouvez même entrevoir son cerveau à travers un trou béant dans son crâne. Des verdicts de jugements ont été purement et simplement cloués dans sa chair.

languages.text: İncendia'nın bedeni tahrip edilmiş. Kafasında bir delik var ve açığa çıkmış beynine kaşıklar saplanmış. Tüm bedenine, üzerilerinde mahkeme kararları bulunan kâğıt parçaları çivilenmiş.
languages.original_text: Incendia's body has been savaged. There is a hole in her skull and spoons stuck in her exposed brain. Pieces of paper with verdicts have been nailed all over her body.

traits.locale_text: İncendia'nın bedeni tahrip edilmiş. Kafasında bir delik var ve açığa çıkmış beynine kaşıklar saplanmış. Tüm bedenine, üzerilerinde mahkeme kararları bulunan kâğıt parçaları çivilenmiş.
